about_the_game:
Freelance hacker Quei-Li is given a new job: uncover information from a secret government network about a high-profile corruption case. While she typically avoids high-risk jobs like this, her curiosity about the secret network and her wish to bring on positive change to Shiba Island convinces her to accept.

The job leads to Quei-Li bluffing her way into the ARI government as an undercover programmer. She builds up a rapport with her coworkers while seeking the information her client needs. The more she digs around, the more secrets Quei-Li discovers, leading her to question her own existence.



  • Choose wisely - help Quei-Li navigate her undercover job. Will she succeed in retrieving the classified data?
  • Multiple endings - what seems like a good outcome might cause someone else to suffer. Your choices impact the endings!
  • Original character artwork - Alicia's dog illustrations make the inhabitants of Shiba Inu Island come to life.
  • Hacking mini-game - step into Quei-Li's role with a brain-twisting hacking mini-game! (Mini-games are skippable)
  • Accessibility options - tune your experience and comfort while enjoying the game. 4k resolution and full HD resolution toggles.

Autumn with the Shiba Inu is set in the same universe as the first game in the Shiba Inu series, A Summer with the Shiba Inu. "Autumn" is a standalone story, so reading "Summer" is not required to enjoy Autumn with the Shiba Inu!

Freelance hacker Quei-Li is given a new job: uncover information from a secret government network about a high-profile corruption case. While she typically avoids high-risk jobs like this, her curiosity about the secret network and her wish to bring on positive change to Shiba Island convinces her to accept.

The job leads to Quei-Li bluffing her way into the ARI government as an undercover programmer. She builds up a rapport with her coworkers while seeking the information her client needs. The more she digs around, the more secrets Quei-Li discovers, leading her to question her own existence.



  • Choose wisely - help Quei-Li navigate her undercover job. Will she succeed in retrieving the classified data?
  • Multiple endings - what seems like a good outcome might cause someone else to suffer. Your choices impact the endings!
  • Original character artwork - Alicia's dog illustrations make the inhabitants of Shiba Inu Island come to life.
  • Hacking mini-game - step into Quei-Li's role with a brain-twisting hacking mini-game! (Mini-games are skippable)
  • Accessibility options - tune your experience and comfort while enjoying the game. 4k resolution and full HD resolution toggles.

Autumn with the Shiba Inu is set in the same universe as the first game in the Shiba Inu series, A Summer with the Shiba Inu. "Autumn" is a standalone story, so reading "Summer" is not required to enjoy Autumn with the Shiba Inu!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any distribution built for x86 or x64 processors
  • Processor: 1 GHz Intel or AMD Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible graphics card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or later
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo or newer
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any OpenGL graphics card capable of running Mac OS X 10.6 or later
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7 or later

movies.name: Autumn with the Shiba Inu Trailer

name: Autumn with the Shiba Inu

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 32/64-bit Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 1 GHz Intel or AMD Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL or DirectX Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Play as Quei-li the Labrador Retriever, a hacker dog! Uncover the secrets of the Shiba Inu government as an undercover hacker, in this mystery story full of twists and turns.
